title: Line of Duty
subtitle: Series 5: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Crime needs an inside man

synopses.small: AC-12 investigate possible police collusion with the hijackers of a drugs transport.
synopses.editorial: Following a deadly hijack, AC-12 must battle a ruthless organised crime group.

title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 1. Nice Face
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A deadly, obsessive game of cat and mouse

synopses.small: When a politician is murdered, an MI5 security officer must protect the only witness.
synopses.editorial: Eve wants excitement. Villanelle wants to kill. The murderous BAFTA-winning sensation.

title: Pose
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A glam, groundbreaking trip to 80s New York

synopses.small: Blanca serves as a member of the House of Abundance but wants to open her own house.
synopses.editorial: Blanca Rodriguez works at a nail salon by day – and comes alive in the ballroom at night.

synopses.small: Louis Theroux meets mothers experiencing mental health problems postpartum.
synopses.editorial: Motherhood is supposed be a happy time – but for some, the experience is traumatic.

title: Back to Life
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Meet Miri – the ultimate Adult Beginner

synopses.small: Miri has been away for 18 years. Now she’s back, can she simply return to her old life?
synopses.editorial: Motherhood is supposed be a happy time – but for some, the experience is traumatic.

title: Earth from Space
subtitle: Series 1: 1. A New Perspective
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Our home as we’ve never seen it

synopses.small: Cameras in space tell stories of life on our planet from a brand new perspective.
synopses.editorial: Life on our planet from a brand new perspective – in all its fast-changing glory.
